title: BSIS Firearm Training
desc: This class is required by the State Department of Consumer Affairs, Bureau of Security and Investigative Services (BSIS) for guards wishing to carry an exposed firearm on duty, armored car guards, armed alarm response agents and private investigators. This firearm course is a self-defense handgun course that will introduce you to the Fundamentals of Firearms Safety, along with the skills necessary to properly handle a semi-automatic pistol (9mm) and a .38 Revolver.? You will learn what a handgun will do, what it won?t do, and why it works the way it works.? Our hands-on training will start with California Laws and Penal Codes in handling a handgun.? We further move into Proper Stance and Grip, Sight Alignment, Sight Picture and Trigger Control, plus Range Safety Rules. The range portion of training will take place at Sharpshooters, 1827 W. 208th?Street, Torrance, CA off Western Blvd.? Please bring a copy of your guard card and proof of citizenship which can include a birth certificate, passport, resident card, military identification card or DD Form 214. This training will allow you to apply for your firearm permit. ?This training does not include BSIS application and live scan fees. ? If you have any questions, please email casandsonsgroup@gmail.com.
